body.name: Litanika Sage Green Queen Comforter Set Cotton, Breathable Solid Color Comforter 3 Pieces, Aesthetic Soft Bedding Set All Season(1 Comforter 90x90 inch, 2 Pillowcases)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 17 mins
features: 【100% Cotton Fabric】Do you want a comforter that combines comfort, durability, and beauty? Why not consider our 100% cotton comforter? The surface of our comforter is made from all-natural, high-quality cotton fabrics and the inner filling is microfiber. Selected materials are woven and processed with care to produce a soft, delicate comforter with a soft texture and excellent warmth. Get it and experience the ultimate in comfort by creating a restful space to sleep with this comforter.

【Soft & Breathable】Litanika insists on using 100% cotton fabrics out of concern for the quality of sleep. Compared to non-100% cotton comforters containing synthetic fibers or other materials, our comforter is based on the natural properties of cotton, are more breathable, and are better able to wick away moisture and regulate body temperature to keep you dry and comfortable. Litanika cotton comforter is the ideal addition to any bedroom for individuals who value comfort and quality.

【Durable & Comfortable】】To ensure durability, we make each comforter with high-quality cotton materials and meticulous craftsmanship. Designed with careful treatment and sturdy stitching, our quilts are durable and reliable and are not prone to warping or fading. They stand the test of time and use, providing you with lasting companionship. By selecting cotton comforter set , you are selecting top quality that will provide you and your family with long-term comfort and warmth.

【3 Pieces Comforter Sets】Litanika comforter queen size includes 1 comforter 90x90 inch and 2 pillowcases 20x26 inch. We offer different colors to suit individual needs. You can of course use the corner straps to secure the comforter in your favorite duvet cover to easily create a distinctive bedroom atmosphere. At the end of a hard day's work, you can sleep soundly with the confidence that you have chosen the perfect choice for your bedding needs.

【USE TIPS】Our 100% cotton comforter is washable in cold water with a gentle cycle. Do not dry clean or bleach. Due to the nature of cotton, there will be a slight shrinkage after washing, which is normal. It can be treated by ironing at a temperature of 160-180. However, if you mind this or if any quality problems occur, you can contact our after-sales service and we will spare no effort to help you solve the problem.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Is this comforter made of 100% cotton? The surface of the comforter is made of 100% cotton fabric while the inner filling is microfiber. Can I receive the comforter with the exact same color as in the picture? Due to different monitors, there will be a slight color difference, hope that you could understand. What is inside of the package? This is a 3-pieces comforter set with 1 comforter and 2 pillowcases. Please noted that there are no pillows inside. What should I do if I need any help with this cotton comforter? If you have any questions, please feel free to connect us and we will solve the problems for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this comforter!
reviews.reviewText: I was on a hunt for a true cotton comforter and was so happy when I found this one. It's lightweight but so fluffy/cozy/cuddly and the color is gorgeous! Because it's cotton and not a microfiber or blend, it is cool and doesn't make you sweat. Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty warm & cosy
reviews.reviewText: Feels ligjt in weight but keeps you warm & cosy. Cotton top cover feels good despite synthetic filling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT BREATHABLE STUFFED WITH SYNTHETIC FIBERS
reviews.reviewText: The outside fabric is cotton but the inside is stuffed with synthetic material that doesn’t breathe at all. Sleeping with this blanket is a miserable experience. Two nights in a row I’ve woken up drenched in sweat. I’m writing this at 4am after sleeping so horrible I got up and changed the bed!The package said Q/K green though I ordered a King. So it’s very short and smaller than my regular King comforter. It’s also extremely thin. Doesn’t look like the photo it’s more like a thin sheet. But that would have been okay if it wasn’t so damn hot!I bought this because I wanted natural fabrics, and I’m pretty sure I spent two nights baking in synthetic fibers. The tag specify a “outer fabric 100% cotton” with no info on the stuffing contents.The pillow case are body pillow length and too long for my regular pillows but one did fit my body pillow. The cases are nice are and breathable unlike the blanket.DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU LIKE SLEEPING IN PLASTIC WRAP! I’d give 0 stars if or let me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars any suggestions on how to get the wrinkles out?
reviews.reviewText: I like the color and the weight, but the wrinkles are just so bad. Haven't the slightest idea how to get rid of them. Nice and soft

reviews.reviewText: It's not the prettiest. It's wrinkled but it's very cozy. Not too light, not too heavy. Just right.
